title: Genius

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player during the day to challenge them to a match of the 1, 2, 3 Game tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will override your target's night ability similarly to a Jailor or Pirate.
- If you win, you will gain one of your three wins and Basic Defense for the night.
- If you lose, your target's defense will raise by one value for the night.
- If there is a tie, nobody profits.
- You may not challenge yourself you nincompoop.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win two matches of the 1, 2, 3 Game.

fields.name: How the 1, 2, 3 Game Works:
fields.value:
- Both players receive a hand of nine cards: three 1s, three 2s, and three 3s.
- The game has nine rounds in which each player plays either a 1, 2, 3.
- The player who played the higher value card will receive a point. If both players played the same card, then neither of them receive a point.
- The player who has the most points after the ninth round wins.
- If the night ends before the match ends, the player with the higher number of points when the night ends will win, or neither if there is a tie.
